summary: Following a series of testing phases, NFT integration is now live on Instagram across 100 countries.
title: Meta Confirms NFT Rollout Across 100 Countries Amid Coinbase Integration
content: Social media giant Meta (META) has started to roll out non-fungible tokens (NFT) across 100 countries after integrating with Coinbase (COIN) Wallet and Dapper.
Read more: Facebook Parent Meta Loses $2.8B on Metaverse Division in Q2
